questiontext.text:
[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]][[feedback:prt1]]

[[jsxgraph width="300px" height="300px"]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [-8, 8, 8, -8], // Adjusted bounding box to fit labels axis: false, showCopyright: false, showNavigation: false, grid: false }); // Center point O var O = board.create('point', [0, 0], {fixed: true, visible: false, name: 'O'}); var radius = 7; var angleDegrees = 45; var angleRadians = angleDegrees * Math.PI / 180; // Point A on the circumference var Ax = radius * Math.cos(0); var Ay = radius * Math.sin(0); var A = board.create('point', [Ax, Ay], { fixed: true, visible: false, name: 'A'}); // Point B on the circumference var Bx = radius * Math.cos(angleRadians); var By = radius * Math.sin(angleRadians); var B = board.create('point', [Bx, By], { fixed: true, visible: false, name: 'B'}); // Draw the arc (sector boundary) var arcSector = board.create('arc', [O, A, B], { strokeColor: 'black', strokeWidth: 1, fillColor: 'lightblue', fillOpacity: 0.5, anticlockwise: true }); // Draw the two segments (radii) var segmentOA = board.create('segment', [O, A], { strokeColor: 'black', strokeWidth: 1 }); var segmentOB = board.create('segment', [O, B], { strokeColor: 'black', strokeWidth: 1 }); // Label for the radius OA var midPointOA = [(O.X() + A.X()) / 2, (O.Y() + A.Y()) / 2]; board.create('text', midPointOA, '7 cm', { anchorX: 'middle', anchorY: 'middle' }); // Angle arc and label inside the sector var angleArc = board.create('arc', [O, radius * 0.6, 0, angleRadians], { strokeColor: 'black', strokeWidth: 1, fillColor: 'none', anticlockwise: true }); board.create('text', [radius * 0.4 * Math.cos(angleRadians / 2), radius * 0.4 * Math.sin(angleRadians / 2)], '45Â°', { anchorX: 'middle', anchorY: 'middle', fontSize: 14 }); // Label for the sector AOB var sectorLabelX = radius * 0.7 * Math.cos(angleRadians / 2); var sectorLabelY = radius * 0.7 * Math.sin(angleRadians / 2); board.create('text', [sectorLabelX, sectorLabelY], 'AOB', { anchorX: 'middle', anchorY: 'middle', fontSize: 16 }); [[/jsxgraph]]

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.
